projects.title: LLM Attribute Extraction (Capstone)
projects.description: Built a LoRA-fine-tuned Qwen-0.5B model to extract structured product attributes from noisy ad text. Designed JSON schema validation, evaluation pipeline, and optimized inference with ONNX Runtime.

projects.title: Agentic AI Travel Planner
projects.description: Developed an autonomous multi-tool agent that retrieves, compares, and ranks travel options using LLM reasoning, LangChain, and n8n automation.
highlights: Dynamic itinerary generation via LLM planning

projects.title: RAG for Feature Enrichment
projects.description: Designed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system to infer rich features from offline RL trajectories given limited online observations.
highlights: Built FAISS-based retrieval of state embeddings
Trained generative mapping model for feature recovery
Validated on HalfCheetah and TextWorld environments

projects.title: Customer Sentiment Classifier (NLP)
projects.description: Fine-tuned BiLSTM sentiment classifier on IMDB dataset with text cleaning, tokenization, and error analysis.
highlights: Performed model calibration and error review
